mapper.sql: t.id, t.micro_id, t.name, t.code, t.uri, t.method, t.sort, t.create_by, t.create_time, t.update_by, t.update_time
mapper.select: SELECT t0.prefix, t1.uri, t1.method FROM sys_micro t0 JOIN sys_func t1 ON t0.id = t1.micro_id JOIN sys_role_func t2 ON t1.id = t2.func_id JOIN sys_user_role t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.role_id JOIN sys_user t4 ON t3.user_id = t4.id WHERE t4.username = #{value}
SELECT count(1) count FROM sys_func t
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_func SET micro_id = #{microId}, name = #{name}, code = #{code}, uri = #{uri}, method = #{method}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
